data.title: Spain Geographic coordinates
data.meta_description: Geographic location of Spain. Coordinates in Decimal Degrees (DM), Degrees and Decimal Minutes (DDM) and Degrees, Minutes and Seconds (DMS).
data.text:
Spain is located at latitude 40.463667 and longitude -3.74922. It is part of Europe and the northern hemisphere.

The geographic coordinate system enables any place in the world to be located using its latitude and longitude. The latitude is the position relative to the equator, specifying the north-south position. The longitude specifies the east-west position measured from a reference meridian (usually the Greenwich Prime Meridian). The latitude and longitude of Spain have been calculated based on the geodetic datum WGS84.

Map of Spain with coordinates

Latitude and longitude of Spain

There are many systems and formats to represent geographic coordinates. The following table matches the equivalence between the most common formats:

Geographic coordinates - Cities of Spain
